duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide onsite local support to attorneys, staff, and business partners on all Firm computer systems via telephone, email, and desk-side assistance.
Multi-task while generating creative and time-sensitive solutions to problems.
Develop skills required to support the efforts of the firm's practice groups and administrative operations.
Assess appropriate priority, take personal ownership, and provide timely results to all customers.
Document incident details, and forward issues needing the support of other teams as appropriate.

Solve issues by utilizing excellent customer service, personal knowledge and resources, problem-solving techniques, technical thinking/reasoning, and a high level of individual discernment to ensure successful technical outcomes.
Develop or update documentation on technical configurations or knowledge base articles.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent combination of education and experience.
